Typealiases.html#/s:6Herald9SecretKeya.name: SecretKey
Typealiases.html#/s:6Herald9SecretKeya.abstract: Secret key for deriving matching keys, contact keys, and contact idenfiers.

Typealiases.html#/s:6Herald11MatchingKey.name: MatchingKey
Typealiases.html#/s:6Herald11MatchingKey.abstract: Matching key for deriving contact keys, and contact identifiers.

Typealiases.html#/s:6Herald17ContactIden.name: ContactIdentifier
Typealiases.html#/s:6Herald17ContactIden.abstract: Contact identifier shared between phones as evidence for an encounter in a specific time period.

Typealiases.html#/s:6Herald16PayloadTime.name: PayloadTimestamp
Typealiases.html#/s:6Herald16PayloadTime.abstract: Payload timestamp, should normally be Date, but it may change to UInt64 in the future to use server synchronised relative timestamp.

Typealiases.html#/s:6Herald16TargetIdent.name: TargetIdentifier
Typealiases.html#/s:6Herald16TargetIdent.abstract: Ephemeral identifier for detected target (e.g. smartphone, beacon, place). This is likely to be an UUID but using String for variable identifier length.

Structs/Location.html#/s:6Herald8Locatio.name: description
Structs/Location.html#/s:6Herald8Locatio.abstract: Get plain text description of proximity data

Structs/Calibration.html#/s:6Herald11Cal.name: value
Structs/Calibration.html#/s:6Herald11Cal.abstract: Measured value, e.g. transmit power in BLE advert

Structs/Calibration.html#/s:6Herald11Cal.name: description
Structs/Calibration.html#/s:6Herald11Cal.abstract: Get plain text description of calibration data

Structs/Proximity.html#/s:6Herald9Proxim.name: description
Structs/Proximity.html#/s:6Herald9Proxim.abstract: Get plain text description of proximity data

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: serviceUUID
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Service UUID for beacon service. This is a fixed UUID to enable iOS devices to find each other even

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: androidSignalCharacteristicUUID
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Signaling characteristic for controlling connection between peripheral and central, e.g. keep each other from suspend state

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: iosSignalCharacteristicUUID
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Signaling characteristic for controlling connection between peripheral and central, e.g. keep each other from suspend state

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: payloadCharacteristicUUID
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Primary payload characteristic (read) for distributing payload data from peripheral to central, e.g. identity data

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: manufacturerIdForSensor
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Manufacturer data is being used on Android to store pseudo device address

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: interopOpenTraceEnabled
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: OpenTrace service UUID, characteristic UUID, and manufacturer ID

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: interopOpenTraceServiceUUID
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: interopOpenTracePayloadCharacteristicUUID
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: interopOpenTraceManufacturerId
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: interopOpenTracePayloadDataUpdateTimeInterval
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: interopAdvertBasedProtocolEnabled
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Advert based protocol service UUID, service data key

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: interopAdvertBasedProtocolServiceUUID
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: interopAdvertBasedProtocolServiceDataKey
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: signalCharacteristicActionWritePayload
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Signal characteristic action code for write payload, expect 1 byte action code followed by 2 byte little-endian Int16 integer value for payload data length, then payload data

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: signalCharacteristicActionWriteRSSI
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Signal characteristic action code for write RSSI, expect 1 byte action code followed by 4 byte little-endian Int32 integer value for RSSI value

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: signalCharacteristicActionWritePayloadSharing
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Signal characteristic action code for write payload, expect 1 byte action code followed by 2 byte little-endian Int16 integer value for payload sharing data length, then payload sharing data

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: signalCharacteristicActionWriteImmediate
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Signal characteristic action code for arbitrary immediate write

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: notificationDelay
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Time delay between notifications for subscribers.

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: advertRestartTimeInterval
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Time delay between advert restart

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: concurrentConnectionQuota
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Maximum number of concurrent BLE connections

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: androidAdvertRefreshTimeInterval
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Advert refresh time interval on Android devices

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: connectionAttemptTimeout
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Herald internal connection expiry timeout

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: venueCheckInTimeLimit
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: The amount of time after which a diary venue event will stay in the log file (may be shown in the UI as ‘pending’ before this limit)

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: venueCheckOutTimeLimit
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: The amount of time after which a venue presence diary event will be said to have been finished

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: venueDiaryDefaultRecordingDays
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: The default number of days to save venue diary visits for, set by preference of the user. May be nil (no limit) or 0 (don’t record anything, ever)

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: venueDiaryDefaultShareDays
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: If sharing a venue diary (E.g. via email to contact tracers), the number of days by default to share. nil means all. 0 means none

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: venueDiaryDefaultShareEmail
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: If sharing a venue diary (E.g. via email to contact tracers), the email address to send the diary to by default when ‘share’ is clicked

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: logLevel
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Log level for BLESensor

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: mobilitySensorEnabled
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Mobility sensor for estimating range of travel without recording location

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: payloadDataUpdateTimeInterval
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Payload update at regular intervals, in addition to default HERALD communication process.

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: filterDuplicatePayloadData
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Filter duplicate payload data and suppress sensor(didRead:fromTarget) delegate calls

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: peripheralCleanInterval
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Remove peripheral records that haven’t been updated for some time.

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: inertiaSensorEnabled
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Enable inertia sensor

Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html.name: BLESensorConfiguration
Structs/BLESensorConfiguration.html.abstract: Defines BLE sensor configuration data, e.g. service and characteristic UUIDs

Structs/Proximity.html.name: Proximity
Structs/Proximity.html.abstract: Raw data for estimating proximity between sensor and target, e.g. RSSI for BLE.

Structs/Calibration.html.name: Calibration
Structs/Calibration.html.abstract: Calibration data for interpreting proximity value between sensor and target, e.g. Transmit power for BLE.

Structs/Location.html.name: Location
Structs/Location.html.abstract: Raw location data for estimating indirect exposure, e.g.

Structs/WGS84PointLocationReference.html.name: WGS84PointLocationReference
Structs/WGS84PointLocationReference.html.abstract: GPS coordinates (latitude,longitude,altitude) in WGS84 decimal format and meters from sea level.

Structs/WGS84CircularAreaLocationReferen.name: WGS84CircularAreaLocationReference
Structs/WGS84CircularAreaLocationReferen.abstract: GPS coordinates and region radius, e.g. latitude and longitude in decimal format and radius in meters.

Structs/MobilityLocationReference.html.name: MobilityLocationReference
Structs/MobilityLocationReference.html.abstract: Distance travelled in any direction in metres, as indicator of range of movement.

Structs/InertiaLocationReference.html.name: InertiaLocationReference
Structs/InertiaLocationReference.html.abstract: Acceleration (x,y,z) in meters per second at point in time

Protocols/SensorDelegate.html#/s:6Herald.name: sensor(_:didDetect:)
Protocols/SensorDelegate.html#/s:6Herald.abstract: Detection of a target with an ephemeral identifier, e.g. BLE central detecting a BLE peripheral.

Protocols/SensorDelegate.html#/s:6Herald.name: sensor(_:didRead:fromTarget:)
Protocols/SensorDelegate.html#/s:6Herald.abstract: Read payload data from target, e.g. encrypted device identifier from BLE peripheral after successful connection.

Protocols/SensorDelegate.html#/s:6Herald.name: sensor(_:didShare:fromTarget:)
Protocols/SensorDelegate.html#/s:6Herald.abstract: Read payload data of other targets recently acquired by a target, e.g. Android peripheral sharing payload data acquired from nearby iOS peripherals.

Protocols/SensorDelegate.html#/s:6Herald.name: sensor(_:didMeasure:fromTarget:)
Protocols/SensorDelegate.html#/s:6Herald.abstract: Measure proximity to target, e.g. a sample of RSSI values from BLE peripheral.

Protocols/SensorDelegate.html#/s:6Herald.name: sensor(_:didVisit:)
Protocols/SensorDelegate.html#/s:6Herald.abstract: Detection of time spent at location, e.g. at specific restaurant between 02/06/2020 19:00 and 02/06/2020 21:00

Protocols/SensorDelegate.html#/s:6Herald.name: sensor(_:didMeasure:fromTarget:withPayload:)
Protocols/SensorDelegate.html#/s:6Herald.abstract: Measure proximity to target with payload data. Combines didMeasure and didRead into a single convenient delegate method

Protocols/Sensor.html#/s:6Herald6SensorP.name: add(delegate:)
Protocols/Sensor.html#/s:6Herald6SensorP.abstract: Add delegate for responding to sensor events.

Protocols/PayloadDataSupplier.html#/s:6H.name: legacyPayload(_:device:)
Protocols/PayloadDataSupplier.html#/s:6H.abstract: Legacy payload supplier callback - for those transitioning their apps to Herald. Note: Device may be null if Payload in use is same for all receivers

Protocols/PayloadDataSupplier.html#/s:6H.name: payload(_:device:)
Protocols/PayloadDataSupplier.html#/s:6H.abstract: Get payload for given timestamp. Use this for integration with any payload generator. Note: Device may be null if Payload in use is same for all receivers

Protocols/PayloadDataSupplier.html#/s:6H.name: payload(_:)
Protocols/PayloadDataSupplier.html#/s:6H.abstract: Parse raw data into payloads. This is used to split concatenated payloads that are transmitted via share payload. The default implementation assumes payload data is fixed length.

Protocols/ExtendedData.html#/s:6Herald12.name: addSection(code:value:)
Protocols/ExtendedData.html#/s:6Herald12.abstract: Catch-all for all other or future types

Protocols/KeyExchange.html#/s:6Herald11K.name: keyPair()
Protocols/KeyExchange.html#/s:6Herald11K.abstract: Generate a random key pair for key exchange with peer

Protocols/KeyExchange.html#/s:6Herald11K.name: sharedKey(own:peer:)
Protocols/KeyExchange.html#/s:6Herald11K.abstract: Generate shared key by combining own private key and peer public key

Protocols/Event.html#/s:6Herald5EventP9c.name: csvHeader
Protocols/Event.html#/s:6Herald5EventP9c.abstract: Get CSV header for event data including timestamp

Protocols/Event.html#/s:6Herald5EventP9c.name: csvString
Protocols/Event.html#/s:6Herald5EventP9c.abstract: Get CSV representation of event data including timestamp

Protocols/Event.html#/s:6Herald5EventPyx.name: init(_:)
Protocols/Event.html#/s:6Herald5EventPyx.abstract: Parse CSV representation of event data to recreate event

Protocols.html#/s:6Herald25BeaconPayload.name: BeaconPayloadDataSupplier
Protocols.html#/s:6Herald25BeaconPayload.abstract: Beacon payload data supplier. Payload data is 9+ bytes.

Protocols.html#/s:6Herald25SimplePayload.name: SimplePayloadDataSupplier
Protocols.html#/s:6Herald25SimplePayload.abstract: Simple payload data supplier. Payload data is 21 bytes.

Protocols.html#/s:6Herald23TestPayloadDa.name: TestPayloadDataSupplier
Protocols.html#/s:6Herald23TestPayloadDa.abstract: Test payload data supplier for generating fixed payload to support evaluation

Protocols/PayloadDataSupplier.html.name: PayloadDataSupplier
Protocols/PayloadDataSupplier.html.abstract: Payload data supplier for generating payload data that is shared with other devices to provide device identity information while maintaining privacy and security.

Protocols/Sensor.html.name: Sensor
Protocols/Sensor.html.abstract: Sensor for detecting and tracking various kinds of disease transmission vectors, e.g. contact with people, time at location.

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: append(_:)
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: MARK:- Conversion from intrinsic types to Data

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: append(_:_:)
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Encode string as data, inserting length as prefix using UInt8,…,64. Returns true if successful, false otherwise.

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: int8(_:)
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: MARK:- Conversion from data to intrinsic types

Extensions/CBManagerState.html.name: CBManagerState
Extensions/CBManagerState.html.abstract: Extension to make the state human readable in logs.

Extensions/CBPeripheralState.html.name: CBPeripheralState
Extensions/CBPeripheralState.html.abstract: Extension to make the state human readable in logs.

Extensions/TimeInterval.html.name: TimeInterval
Extensions/TimeInterval.html.abstract: Extension to make the time intervals more human readable in code.

Enums/CalibrationMeasurementUnit.html#/s.name: BLETransmitPower
Enums/CalibrationMeasurementUnit.html#/s.abstract: Bluetooth transmit power for describing expected RSSI at 1 metre for interpretation of measured RSSI value.

Enums/ProximityMeasurementUnit.html#/s:6.name: RSSI
Enums/ProximityMeasurementUnit.html#/s:6.abstract: Received signal strength indicator, e.g. BLE signal strength as proximity estimator.

Enums/ProximityMeasurementUnit.html#/s:6.name: RTT
Enums/ProximityMeasurementUnit.html#/s:6.abstract: Roundtrip time, e.g. Audio signal echo time duration as proximity estimator.

Enums/SensorState.html#/s:6Herald11Senso.name: on
Enums/SensorState.html#/s:6Herald11Senso.abstract: Sensor is powered on, active and operational

Enums/SensorState.html#/s:6Herald11Senso.name: off
Enums/SensorState.html#/s:6Herald11Senso.abstract: Sensor is powered off, inactive and not operational

Enums/SensorType.html#/s:6Herald10Sensor.name: MOBILITY
Enums/SensorType.html#/s:6Herald10Sensor.abstract: Mobility sensor - uses Location API measure range travelled

Enums/SensorType.html#/s:6Herald10Sensor.name: GPS
Enums/SensorType.html#/s:6Herald10Sensor.abstract: GPS location sensor - not used by default in Herald

Enums/SensorType.html#/s:6Herald10Sensor.name: OTHER
Enums/SensorType.html#/s:6Herald10Sensor.abstract: Other - Incase of an extension between minor versions of Herald

Enums/EventTimeIntervalLogEventType.html.name: EventTimeIntervalLogEventType
Enums/EventTimeIntervalLogEventType.html.abstract: Event type to log in event time interval log

Enums/StringLengthEncodingOption.html.name: StringLengthEncodingOption
Enums/StringLengthEncodingOption.html.abstract: Encoding option for string length data as prefix

Enums/ExtendedDataSegmentCodes.html.name: ExtendedDataSegmentCodes
Enums/ExtendedDataSegmentCodes.html.abstract: CURRENT complete list, across all version, with CURRENT names

Enums/ExtendedDataSegmentCodesV1.html.name: ExtendedDataSegmentCodesV1
Enums/ExtendedDataSegmentCodesV1.html.abstract: V1 codes, with names and codes at the time

Enums/SensorType.html.name: SensorType
Enums/SensorType.html.abstract: Sensor type as qualifier for target identifier.

Enums/ProximityMeasurementUnit.html.name: ProximityMeasurementUnit
Enums/ProximityMeasurementUnit.html.abstract: Measurement unit for interpreting the proximity data values.

Enums/CalibrationMeasurementUnit.html.name: CalibrationMeasurementUnit
Enums/CalibrationMeasurementUnit.html.abstract: Measurement unit for calibrating the proximity transmission data values, e.g. BLE transmit power

Classes/ConcreteSimplePayloadDataSupplie.name: payload(_:)
Classes/ConcreteSimplePayloadDataSupplie.abstract: Default implementation assumes fixed length payload data.

Classes/ConcreteBeaconPayloadDataSupplie.name: payload(_:)
Classes/ConcreteBeaconPayloadDataSupplie.abstract: Default implementation assumes fixed length payload data with no extended data

Classes/Device.html#/s:6Herald6DeviceC10.name: identifier
Classes/Device.html#/s:6Herald6DeviceC10.abstract: Ephemeral device identifier, e.g. peripheral identifier UUID

Classes/UIntBig.html#/s:6Herald7UIntBigC.abstract: Compare a and b, ignoring leading zeros

Classes/UIntBig.html#/s:6Herald7UIntBigC.name: bitLength()
Classes/UIntBig.html#/s:6Herald7UIntBigC.abstract: Count of bits based on highest set bit

Classes/DiffieHellmanParameters.html#/s:.name: modpGroup1
Classes/DiffieHellmanParameters.html#/s:.abstract: RFC 2409 MODP Group 1 : 768-bits : First Oakley Group : Generator = 2

Classes/DiffieHellmanParameters.html#/s:.name: modpGroup2
Classes/DiffieHellmanParameters.html#/s:.abstract: RFC 2409 MODP Group 2 : 1024-bits : Second Oakley Group : Generator = 2

Classes/EventLog.html#/s:6Herald8EventLo.name: subdata(start:end:)
Classes/EventLog.html#/s:6Herald8EventLo.abstract: Get records from start date (inclusive) to end date (exclusive)

Classes/EventLog.html#/s:6Herald8EventLo.name: remove(before:)
Classes/EventLog.html#/s:6Herald8EventLo.abstract: Remove all log records before date (exclusive). Use this function to implement data retention policy.

Classes/EventLog.html#/s:6Herald8EventLo.name: removeBefore(retention:)
Classes/EventLog.html#/s:6Herald8EventLo.abstract: Remove all log records before retention period.

Classes/BLEDevice.html#/s:6Herald9BLEDev.name: rssi
Classes/BLEDevice.html#/s:6Herald9BLEDev.abstract: Most recent RSSI measurement taken by readRSSI or didDiscover.

Classes/BLEDevice.html#/s:6Herald9BLEDev.name: txPower
Classes/BLEDevice.html#/s:6Herald9BLEDev.abstract: Transmit power data where available (only provided by Android devices)

Classes/VenueDiary.html#/s:6Herald10Venu.name: setRecordingFile(_:)
Classes/VenueDiary.html#/s:6Herald10Venu.abstract: Set the file to save the data to

Classes/VenueDiary.html#/s:6Herald10Venu.name: findOrCreateEvent(country:state:venue:name:extended:seen:with:)
Classes/VenueDiary.html#/s:6Herald10Venu.abstract: Find a contact event and add to it, or create a new one

Classes/VenueDiary.html#/s:6Herald10Venu.name: getLatestEvent(_:)
Classes/VenueDiary.html#/s:6Herald10Venu.abstract: Return latest diary event, optionally may return latest that isn’t yet recordable (so you can monitor the feature in a UI)

Classes/VenueDiary.html#/s:6Herald10Venu.name: addEncounter(_:with:at:)
Classes/VenueDiary.html#/s:6Herald10Venu.abstract: Utility function, mainly for testing. Could also be used for external event definitions (E.g. QR code scan)

Classes/SocialDistance.html#/s:6Herald14.name: scoreByProximity(_:_:measuredPower:excludeRssiBelow:)
Classes/SocialDistance.html#/s:6Herald14.abstract: Calculate social distance score based on maximum RSSI per 1 minute time window over duration

Classes/SocialDistance.html#/s:6Herald14.name: scoreByTarget(_:_:maximumDeviceCount:excludeRssiBelow:)
Classes/SocialDistance.html#/s:6Herald14.abstract: Calculate social distance score based on number of different devices per 1 minute time window over duration

Classes/Interactions.html#/s:6Herald12In.name: subdata(start:end:)
Classes/Interactions.html#/s:6Herald12In.abstract: Get encounters from start date (inclusive) to end date (exclusive)

Classes/Interactions.html#/s:6Herald12In.name: remove(before:)
Classes/Interactions.html#/s:6Herald12In.abstract: Remove all log records before date (exclusive). Use this function to implement data retention policy.

Classes/Interactions.html#/s:6Herald12In.name: reduceByTime(_:duration:)
Classes/Interactions.html#/s:6Herald12In.abstract: Herald achieves > 93% continuity for 30 second windows, thus quantising encounter timestamps into 60 second

Classes/Interactions.html#/s:6Herald12In.name: reduceByTarget(_:)
Classes/Interactions.html#/s:6Herald12In.abstract: Get all target devices, duration and proximity distribution. The result is a table of payload data

Classes/Interactions.html#/s:6Herald12In.name: reduceByProximity(_:unit:bin:)
Classes/Interactions.html#/s:6Herald12In.abstract: Histogram of exposure offers an esimate of exposure, while avoiding resolution of actual payload identity.

Classes/RssiHistogram.html#/s:6Herald13R.name: init(min:max:updatePeriod:textFile:)
Classes/RssiHistogram.html#/s:6Herald13R.abstract: Accumulate histogram of RSSI for value range [min, max] and auto-write profile to storage at regular intervals

Classes/RssiHistogram.html#/s:6Herald13R.name: read(_:)
Classes/RssiHistogram.html#/s:6Herald13R.abstract: Read profile data from storage, this replaces existing in-memory profile

Classes/RssiHistogram.html.name: RssiHistogram
Classes/RssiHistogram.html.abstract: Accumulate histogram of all RSSI measurements to build

Classes/SmoothedLinearModel.html.name: SmoothedLinearModel
Classes/SmoothedLinearModel.html.abstract: Distance model based on cable car experiment data collected on test rig 2

Classes/RiskAggregationBasic.html.name: RiskAggregationBasic
Classes/RiskAggregationBasic.html.abstract: A Basic sample but non scientific risk aggregation model.

Classes/Interactions.html.name: Interactions
Classes/Interactions.html.abstract: Log of interactions for recording encounters (time, proximity, and identity).

Classes.html#/s:6Herald9EncounterC.name: Encounter
Classes.html#/s:6Herald9EncounterC.abstract: Encounter record describing proximity with target at a moment in time

Classes/Mobility.html.name: Mobility
Classes/Mobility.html.abstract: Estimate distance travelled without recording actual locations visited to produce mobility indicator for

Classes/SocialDistance.html.name: SocialDistance
Classes/SocialDistance.html.abstract: Estimate social distance to other app users to encourage people to keep their distance from

Classes/VenueEncounter.html.name: VenueEncounter
Classes/VenueEncounter.html.abstract: Encounter record describing proximity with target at a moment in time

Classes/BatteryLog.html.name: BatteryLog
Classes/BatteryLog.html.abstract: Battery log for monitoring battery level over time

Classes/ContactLog.html.name: ContactLog
Classes/ContactLog.html.abstract: CSV contact log for post event analysis and visualisation

Classes/DetectionLog.html.name: DetectionLog
Classes/DetectionLog.html.abstract: CSV contact log for post event analysis and visualisation

Classes/EventLog.html.name: EventLog
Classes/EventLog.html.abstract: Generic event log with optional data retention enforcement functions

Classes/EventTimeIntervalLog.html.name: EventTimeIntervalLog
Classes/EventTimeIntervalLog.html.abstract: CSV log of events for analysis and visualisation

Classes/DiffieHellmanMerkle.html.name: DiffieHellmanMerkle
Classes/DiffieHellmanMerkle.html.abstract: Diffie-Hellman-Merkle key exchange using NCSC Foundation Profile MODP group 14 (2048-bit) by default

Classes/TestRandomFunction.html.name: TestRandomFunction
Classes/TestRandomFunction.html.abstract: Test random source that produces the same ressult for all calls

Classes/SensorDelegateLogger.html.name: SensorDelegateLogger
Classes/SensorDelegateLogger.html.abstract: Default sensor delegate with convenient functions for writing data to log file.

Classes/StatisticsLog.html.name: StatisticsLog
Classes/StatisticsLog.html.abstract: CSV contact log for post event analysis and visualisation

Classes/UIntBig.html.name: UIntBig
Classes/UIntBig.html.abstract: Mutable unsigned integer of unlimited size (for 32-bit architectures)

Classes/PayloadData.html.name: PayloadData
Classes/PayloadData.html.abstract: Encrypted payload data received from target. This is likely to be an encrypted datagram of the target’s actual permanent identifier.

Classes/SensorArray.html.name: SensorArray
Classes/SensorArray.html.abstract: Sensor array for combining multiple detection and tracking methods.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
